content: these versatile snowflakes can be used to decorate your christmas tree or hang them up around your house d you can tie them onto a package or present or include one in a card this is also a good way to use up some left over bits of thread if you have any just a small amount is needed to make each snowflake **finished measurements** 2 1/2 **materials needed** a small amount of size 10 thread 1 75 mm hook yarn needle for weaving in ends
